title: Drawing, "A Fountain in a Park, Niagara Falls.", October 1856
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite ?, at various locations: Delicious yellow / cool green / earth / Rich green / [the date]; and at top right; 2 Dazzling yellow (sun) / 3 warmer / 4 do / 5 pinkish
description: Vertical view of a circular fountain with an elaborated central part including to basins is shown against a background of a tree topped hill.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "A Fountain in a Park, Niagara Falls.", October 1856.
October 1856. Graphite on olivish paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-35.
